column4: i have the ew-7722in wireless card. it seems to be detected but it just says 'not connected'. anyone know what may be wrong?
can you see it with lspci ?
yeah, shows up as 'network controller: Ralink corp.'
ok that's good.  do you have iwconfig installed?
yeah, it has 2 antennas. it's a desktop pci btw
can you see access points from any other computers in the same area?
no unfortunately, which is the problem :(
well it looks like your drivers and software are setup correctly
the next thing i'd do would be try running it somewhere that you know has a wireless connection
i know i have a wireless connect, i use the same card on windows OOB
you could also try: cat /var/log|grep <your card name or wlan0 or something>
yea it looks like you just don't have any access points available on the air
what kind of card is it? b/g/n?
sometimes the newest version isn't the most stable
